content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Workshop
For a list of all items and upgrades within the Construction skill, see Construction/Level up table.
Workshop
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Icon
Construction level15
Cost10,000
Door layout
Workshop

The Workshop in a player-owned house is a room where the player can create heraldic items, clockwork toys, and flatpack items as well as repair some degraded armour and gather an unlimited amount of specific tools from a tool store.

This room can be created with 15 Construction and 10,000.

After building a workbench in the workshop, a player can create furniture in the form of a flatpack.

There are 5 hotspots available:

  • Clockmaking space
  • Heraldry space
  • Repair space
  • Tool space
  • Workbench space

Contents

  • 1 Clockmaking
  • 2 Heraldry stands
  • 3 Repair benches
  • 4 Tool stores
  • 5 Workbenches

Level Table Materials Craftable items Experience Upgrade Cost Total Cost
16 Crafting table 1 Oak plank x4 Toy horseys and wooden cats 240 N/A 1,884
25 Crafting table 2 Crafting table 1
Molten glass 		Previous + clockwork 1 124 2,008
34 Crafting table 3 Crafting table 2
Molten glass x2 		Previous + toy soldiers, toy dolls, and clockwork suits 2 248 2,256
42 Crafting table 4 Crafting table 3
Oak plank x2 		Previous + sextants, watches, toy mice, and clockwork cats 120 942 3,198

Level Heraldry stand Materials Makes Experience Cost
16 Pluming stand Oak plank x2 Heraldic helmets 120 942
41 Shield easel Oak plank x4 Heraldic helmets and kiteshields 240 1,884
66 Banner easel Oak plank x8
Bolt of cloth x2 		Heraldic helmets, kiteshields, and banners 510 5,682

Repair benches[edit | edit source]

Level Repair bench Materials Repairable items Experience Cost
15 Repair bench Oak plank x2 Broken arrows and staves 120 942
35 Whetstone Oak plank x4
Limestone brick 		Broken arrows, staves, and rusty swords 260 2,058
55 Armour stand Oak plank x8
Limestone brick 		Armour such as Barrows equipment, plus all of the above. 500 3,942

Tool stores[edit | edit source]

Tool stores are constructed in upgrades: before a higher level tool store can be built, the player must first build the one before it.

Level Tool store Materials Contains Experience Upgrade Cost Total Cost
15 Tool store 1 Oak plank x2 Saws, hammers, chisels and shears 120 N/A 942
25 Tool store 2 Tool store 1
Oak plank x2 		Buckets, knives, spades, and tinderboxes 120 942 1,884
35 Tool store 3 Tool store 2
Oak plank x2 		Brown aprons, glassblowing pipes, and needles 120 942 2,826
44 Tool store 4 Tool store 3
Oak plank x2 		Amulet, necklace, ring, holy symbol, bracelet, and tiara moulds 120 942 3,768
55 Tool store 5 Tool store 4
Oak plank x2 		Rakes, spades, trowels, seed dibbers, watering cans, and secateurs 120 942 4,710

Level Workbench Materials Makes flatpacks Experience Upgrade Cost Total Cost

Oak plank x2
Steel bar 		Any flatpackable item 140 1,385 7,368
